Your Snack Club subscription continues until you cancel, and you will automatically receive shipments at the frequency you select. You may cancel your subscription (or a single order) any time via the Subscription page in Your Account. Prices are subject to increase, upon notice to you. By clicking "Confirm Purchase” you are signing up for our Snack Club and agree to our Terms & Conditions and Terms of Sale and Privacy Policy. You authorize us to charge your default payment method or another payment method on file every 1, 2, or 3 months depending on your subscription selection.
KIND makes wholesome, delicious, healthy snacks with ingredients you will recognize like whole nuts, whole grains, and a variety of fruits and spices.

We offer a 15% discount on all purchases (excluding recurring subscription orders).
